description:
Learn how to create landing pages that bring you a ton of customers.

Driving campaign traffic to your main site is a big mistake. Internet users have an ever-decreasing attention span and you only have one chance and few seconds to make that great first impression and convince your visitors that your product or a service is worth their time and money.

Many entrepreneurs and marketers make this mistake of directing traffic from marketing campaigns to their main website and they end up losing customers and paying huge amounts for advertisement.

In this course, I will teach you how to be a clever digital marketer and convert your visitors into your customers using landing pages.

You will learn secrets and hacks behind this amazing marketing tool. I will show you lots of examples by other companies — how they made it and how they screwed up.

In section 4 we will build a landing page together with an easy-to-use drag-n-drop landing page builder called Instapage.

Towards the end, I will ask you to submit your landing page to me, which I will review in one of the Bonus Lectures. This is where I take landing pages made by my students, and review them once a week. I give both design and marketing advice and try to put you on the right path.

Not many Udemy instructors provide feedback and coursework reviews. But I believe, to learn a skill as quickly as possible, it is important to receive a feedback from the teacher.

Have you heard of A/B testing? It's this trending marketing practice that can bring amazing results for your landing page. Barack Obama was able to raise extra $60 Million in campaign donations by using this technique. I will show you how they did it and how you can use the power of A/B testing for your business.

Take this course and start creating high-converting landing pages now.
title: Complete Course on Building a Killer Landing Page in 2016
